data.message: How can I get a live person to help me with a facebook issue? I have scoured the internet and forums for days, and still cannot find a resolution.

replies.message: Hi Rich. This is a great place to ask questions. How can we help? -Jessica

Thank you for taking the time to respond Jessica... I no longer have access to the email account tied to my facebook profile. When I change to my gmail account, I never receive the confirmation email to continue through that process. 
I've tried it so many times now, that I was actually "Blocked" about 20 minutes ago.
Facebook - Did I miss my window of opportunity? :)
Hey Rich. If you're not receiving your confirmation email, please fill out this form so we can help: http://bit.ly/2yB6lwd. -Kiara
Facebook filling it in now...
Facebook I sent that in yesterday afternoon - is there anyway to check status?
Rich,, that is real service - a virtuel company offering virtuel support persons sending virtual answers. welcome in the new world of mark zuckerberg ...  lol
Yea, I still have yet to get resolution or a response to what they had asked for... starting to believe all of what I had read about the lackluster support
what about helping me?
How can we get our fundraiser money from you all that we raised? Swaul sisters is our page, I've inbox , called email and no response, it's been a week now , or ministry event is this weekend 😞
Page is gone ... no email as of why or reasoning? Just gone all my pictures, videos, friends GONE .... FB user since 05'

Hi there. If your Facebook account has been disabled, you'll see a special message when you try to log in. We disable Facebook accounts that don't follow the Facebook Terms. If you think your account was disabled by mistake, you can submit an appeal. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2hUlrlT. -Brittany
Facebook I can’t log in to other account to dispute.
Brittany from Facebook, do anyone see my messages? We have not received our funds from a fundraiser a week ago? Please assist
Facebook
Hi Renita. Payouts generally take 2 weeks to process. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2zttbVK. -Brittany

Finally someone responds 😊thank you so much and I will follow up, thanks again for your response , it didn't show or say it would take that long, that's way passed our event date 😔but we will have to just move on
Facebook ?
Facebook - Any chance I can get an updated status on my issue? I've submitted the requested input twice and have heard nothing in response.
I can't get an answer either Rich, submitted my question twice this is my 2nd post on here just need some help and the help section is no help
Facebook New and aggressive site clogging feeds of progressivefb users Democracy Rising Democrats United appears to be a plant aimed at causing rage among dems. It is working and spreading FAST
Facebook My ticker has been gone for 2 weeks. Is this a permanent thing?
Facebook Did facebook change notifications? I missed a notification when someone commented on my post
Facebook Action Blocked what can I do now?
